rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0001
rows.name:
No signs of any radiation.
Infrared...motion sensors... I got nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0002
rows.name: This thing's dead as a doornail.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0003
rows.name: Oh, maaan... So it's basically a Skell, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0004
rows.name:
But the make is nothing like ours...or the Ganglion's.
Where could it be from?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0005
rows.name: Oh wow—I can't even tell what its armor is made of! [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0006
rows.name: (What is this feeling...)[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0007
rows.name: (It's...oppressive... It's pulsing off of this thing...)[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0008
rows.name:
(It's almost as if...the ghost of its pilot
is somehow still lingering...)[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0009
rows.name: (And that material there...at its core...)[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0010
rows.name: (It's...dark matter...)[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0011
rows.name: (This must be their handiwork...)[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06080100_JNK0010
rows.name: Show Curiosity

rows.label: xs06080100_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Elma if she has any idea what it is.

rows.label: xs06080100_JNK0020
rows.name: Show Concern

rows.label: xs06080100_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Elma if she's all right.

rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0012
rows.name: Hm? No. No idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0013
rows.name: Hm? Oh, sorry—I'm fine. Just thinking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0014
rows.name:
All right, well, we got what we came here for.
Let's call in the salvage choppers and get it out of here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0015
rows.name: Lin, contact Commander Vandham.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs06080100_MSG0016
rows.name: On it.[ST:wait ]
